text: Hiwa rakip hi nangni'n ningjetjei innum, kei'n woikhat nangnidiang minjet tharritna kinei kha eii, khachu Pumi'n1:5: Pumi; Manuscript lekkhat achu hitia injia Jisu, Greek chongnga injia khale in-ang Joshua. Israel mi ngaikha apha inkhat-ah Egypt ramsuung makheiya aheikatan, takkha ngamna kaneimak mi ngaikha aheikatansuo nuk-ah aminmang. Suok 12:51; Teelna 14:29-30
